column4: Running ubuntu 11.04/gnome classic... my windows don't have title bars and I can't move/resize them. I know compiz is still running b/c I can change workspaces... how do I get my window titles back?
then use the compiz config manager to change the default value of the now-tied-to-uniti gtk-window-decorator for the line i provided you
anyone who tried to run 11.04 without unity regreted
